project.name: WSO2 Carbon - Application Management UI
project.description: Application Management UI component for WSO2 Carbon

instructions.Import-Package:

org.wso2.carbon.ui.util; version="${carbon.kernel.package.import.version.range}", org.wso2.carbon.utils; version="${carbon.kernel.package.import.version.range}",
